channel.title: Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Telluride Awards Analysis: ‘Springsteen’ Propels Jeremy Allen White and Jeremy Strong Into Oscar Contention
item.description: Scott Cooper’s portrait of The Boss, which centers on one of the darkest periods in Springsteen’s life, is not at all like the recent Academy-embraced rock star films ‘Bohemian Rhapsody,’ ‘Rocketman’

item.title: Telluride Awards Analysis: ‘Springsteen’ Propels Jeremy Allen White and Jeremy Strong Into Oscar Contention
item.description: Scott Cooper’s portrait of The Boss, which centers on one of the darkest periods in Springsteen’s life, is not at all like the recent Academy-embraced rock star films ‘Bohemian Rhapsody,’ ‘Rocketman’

item.title: Telluride: Jafar Panahi on Hand, George Clooney Not, as Fest Kicks Off with Patrons Brunch and ‘La Grazia’ Preview
item.description: The fest also confirmed that Bruce Springsteen will be at the fest in support of ‘Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere,’ Scott Cooper’s narrative film starring Jeremy Allen White.
